name: 工業安全與衛生
description: 針對工業安全衛生進行整體性的介紹，透過相關的安全衛生理論、國內法令條文的說明與實際案例討論，使學生具備安全衛生基本知識，並且了解自身的權利與義務。
goals: 具備主動積極與終身學習之人格特質
具備良好的溝通與表達能力
具備職場專業倫理的理解與實踐
syllabus:
**【授課方式：16+2週】**，並明列彈性授課進行方式。\[Teaching method: 16+2 weeks\], and specify the flexible teaching method.

由於各先進國家推展工業安全工作，使意外事故顯著減少，並可減少雇主之額外損失，提高生產效率。加強工業衛生，可使勞工確保高度之勞動力，防止職業意外事故發生。

This course will focus on occupational safety and health topics including occupational safety, environmental health, risk management and relative Act. As various countries promote industrial safety work, accidents have been significantly reduced. Every factory attaches great importance to industrial hygiene, can ensure labor and prevent occupational accidents.

職業安全衛生能解決各種職業意外事故及職業傷病之問題，促進勞工之健康度與福祉，本課程將從工廠安全衛生開始，討論事故的預防、工作安全與防護，以達危害認知、評估及管制，並建立修課同學對職業安全衛生之重要概念。

Occupational safety and health can solve various occupational accidents and occupational injuries and diseases, and promote the health and well-being of workers. This course will start with factory safety and health and discuss accident prevention, work safety and protection. Students in the course can have a basic concept of occupational safety and health, as well as the cognition, assessment and management ability.

以下為各週之預排進度：

The following is the schedule for each week:

第 一 週：職業安全衛生概論   Week 1: Introduction to Occupational Safety and Health

第 二 週：安全衛生教育  Week 2: Safety and Health Education

第 三 週：工作安全分析  Week 3: Work Safety Analysis

第 四 週：火災爆炸防止  Week 4: Fire and explosion prevention

第 五 週：機械危害與防護  Week 5: Mechanical hazards and protection

第 六 週：電氣安全  Week 6: Electrical safety

第 七 週：墜落災害預防  Week 7: Fall disaster prevention

第 八 週：危險性機械設備  Week 8: Dangerous machinery and equipment

第 九 週：手工具安全  Week 9: Hand tool safety

第 十 週：危害物質  Week 10: Hazardous substances

第十一週：噪音控制  Week 11: Noise Control

第十二週：輻射防護  Week 12: Radiation Protection

第十三週：個人防護具和作業服裝  Week 13: Personal protective equipment and work clothing

第十四週：急救  Week 14: First Aid

第十五週：職場壓力預防  Week 15: Workplace Stress Prevention

第十六週：建立安全衛生工作環境  Week 16: Establish a safe and hygienic working environment

第十七週及十八週：數位自主學習  Week 17 and 18: Seventeenth and eighteenth weeks: digital self-directed learning
